MESSAGE.value:
blackjack
a player can win with a hand of 2 cards that make 21
The game is won if either player or dealer has blackjack with initial hand of 2 cards each
if neither player has blackjack then the player can start drawing cards from the top of the deck
A Player should stop drawing cards from the deck if their total reaches 17 or higher
A Player has lost the game if their total is higher than 21
when the Player has stopped drawing cards the Dealer can start drawing cards Introduced the notion of state here on hands and games

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: when the Player has stopped drawing cards the Dealer can start drawing cards Introduced the notion of state here on hands and games
